journey_review: Explored the Golden Gate Park nearby and then walked across the bridge. The architecture atmosphere is so calming.
Visited the Eiffel Tower at night when it was all lit up. It was a magical experience. The cityscape from the top is breathtaking!
Explored the history of the Incas and marveled at the precision of the stone architecture. Machu Picchu is a true wonder!
Snorkeled at the Great Barrier Reef and witnessed the vibrant coral and diverse marine life. A dream come true for any nature lover!
